Masih Mentok di 5%, Ini Perkiraan Pertumbuhan Ekonomi RI 2019
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Trio Hamdani


Ilustrasi pertumbuhan ekonomi/Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Pemerintah memperkirakan pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia di 2019 bakal berada di kisaran 5,05-5,06%. Sementara pertumbuhan di kuartal III-2019 menurut data Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) hanya 5,02%."Setahunnya seperti yang telah disampaikan, kita masih melihat bahwa kita itu bisa tumbuh di sekitar ya kurang lebih sama lah dengan level 5,05-5,06%, di sekitar itu," kata Wakil Menteri Keuangan (Wamenkeu) Suahasil Nazara di Hotel Indonesia Kempinski, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Kemenkeu pun putar otak bagaimana agar APBN yang ada saat ini bisa membuat pertumbuhan ekonomi di kisaran angka tersebut."Berarti kita terus berusaha menjaga supaya APBN itu bisa terus memberi support kepada pertumbuhan di level sekian," ujar Suahasil."Artinya apa? artinya belanja pemerintah kita akan tetap pastikan di tengah-tengah pelemahan global yang ada imbas kepada pelemahan penerimaan, kita akan memastikan belanja tetap bisa mendukung pertumbuhan ekonomi," tambah mantan Kepala Badan Kebijakan Fiskal Kemenkeu itu.Sebelumnya BPS mencatat pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia di kuartal III-2019 sebesar 5,02% year on year (yoy). Angka ini jauh lebih rendah dari kuartal III-2018 sebesar 5,17%.Kepala BPS Suhariyanto mengatakan, catatan nilai pertumbuhan ekonomi kuartal III ini disebabkan realisasi investasi yang masih rendah."Perlu jadi catatan bahwa besarnya realisasi investasi di BKPM hanya 14-15% dari total PNBP yang ada di PDB," tutur Suhariyanto di Gedung BPS, Selasa (5/11/2019).Simak Video "Sandi: Pemerintah Terjebak Dalam Pertumbuhan Ekonomi 5%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/hns)

Still Stored at 5%, This Estimates Indonesia's Economic Growth 2019
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Trio Hamdani


Illustration of economic growth / Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - The government estimates that Indonesia's economic growth in 2019 will be in the range of 5.05-5.06%. While growth in the third quarter of 2019 according to data from the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) is only 5.02%. "A year as stated, we still see that we can grow around, more or less the same as the level of 5.05-5 , 06%, around that, "said Deputy Minister of Finance (Deputy Minister of Finance) Suahasil Nazara at the Hotel Indonesia Kempinski, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). The Ministry of Finance was also brainstormed how the current state budget could make economic growth in "That means we keep trying to keep the state budget so that it can continue to support growth at such a level," said Suahasil. "What does that mean? means that our government spending will remain certain in the midst of the global weakening that there is an impact on the weakening of revenue "We will ensure that expenditure can still support economic growth," added the former Head of the Ministry of Finance's Fiscal Policy Office. Previously BPS recorded Indonesia's economic growth in the third quarter of 2019 of 5.02% year on year. r (yoy). This figure is much lower than the quarter III-2018 of 5.17%. Head of BPS Suhariyanto said, the record value of economic growth in the third quarter was due to investment realization that was still low. "It should be noted that the amount of investment realization in BKPM was only 14-15% of the total PNBP in GDP, "Suhariyanto said at the BPS Building, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
